TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ActivityExecutionResult extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Enumeration of activity result values that qualifies the state of an that has an of .

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
Result represents the final status of an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> instance within a workflow instance. The values of the enumeration are based upon the activity state diagram that is determined by the activity-engine contract. Values other than None are allowed only for an activity whose <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> is <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionResult Canceled = unsigned int8(2)

Docs.summary: The activity has transitioned to the closed state from the canceling state.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionResult Compensated = unsigned int8(3)

Docs.summary: The activity has transitioned to the closed state from the compensating state.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionResult Faulted = unsigned int8(4)

Docs.summary: The activity has transitioned to the closed state from the faulting state.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionResult None = unsigned int8(0)

Docs.summary: The activity is not in the state.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionResult Succeeded = unsigned int8(1)

Docs.summary: The activity has transitioned to the closed state from the executing state.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionResult Uninitialized = unsigned int8(5)

Docs.summary: The activity has transitioned to the closed state from the initialized state.
